description: Structured information on a file repository.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.title: IRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma._instruction: Add the content type of this file repository.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.title: format

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.title: hash

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste._instruction: Add the host of this file repository.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste.title: hostedBy

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.title: name
